publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2674 Mr Andy Kerr: Budget (Scotland) (No.3) Bill-That the Parliament agrees that the Budget (Scotland) (No.3) Bill be passed. Supported by: Mr Jack McConnell*, Mr Jim Wallace*, Patricia Ferguson*, Peter Peacock*

S1M-2674 Mr Andy Kerr: Budget (Scotland) (No.3) Bill-That the Parliament agrees that the Budget (Scotland) (No.3) Bill be passed. Supported by: Mr Jack McConnell, Mr Jim Wallace, Patricia Ferguson, Peter Peacock
